com.software.reuze

Class gb_a_Vector3IdSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.gb_a_Vector3IdSelector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ga_PlaneSelector, gb_Vector3IdSelectorDefault

    public abstract class gb_a_Vector3IdSelector
extends Object
    Abstract parent class for selecting mesh vertices and manipulating resulting selections using set theory operations. Implementations of this class should aim to work with all mesh types (e.g. gb_TriangleMesh, gb_WETriangleMesh).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      gb_a_Vector3IdSelector(gb_i_Mesh mesh)
      Creates a new selector assigned to the given mesh

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      gb_a_Vector3IdSelector addSelection(gb_a_Vector3IdSelector sel2)
      Adds all vertices selected by the given selector to the current selection.
      gb_a_Vector3IdSelector clearSelection()
      Clears the current selection.
      gb_i_Mesh getMesh()
      Returns the associated mesh for this selector.
      Collection<gb_Vector3Id> getSelection()
      Returns the actual collection of selected vertices
      gb_a_Vector3IdSelector invertSelection()
      Creates a new selection of all vertices NOT currently selected.
      gb_a_Vector3IdSelector selectSimilar(Collection<? extends gb_Vector3> points)
      Selects vertices identical or closest to the ones given in the list of points.
      abstract gb_a_Vector3IdSelector selectVertices()
      Selects vertices using an implementation specific method.
      void setMesh(gb_i_Mesh mesh)
      Assigns a new mesh instance to this selector and clears the current selection.
      int size()
      Returns the current number of selected vertices.
      gb_a_Vector3IdSelector subtractSelection(gb_a_Vector3IdSelector sel2)
      Removes all vertices selected by the given selector from the current selection.

        public gb_a_Vector3IdSelector addSelection(gb_a_Vector3IdSelector sel2)

        Returns:

      • selectVertices

        public abstract gb_a_Vector3IdSelector selectVertices()
        Selects vertices using an implementation specific method. This is the only method which needs to be implemented by any selector subclass.
        Returns:
        itself
